quotes.quote: The hope of a secure and livable world lies with disciplined nonconformists who are dedicated to justice, peace and brotherhood.

Nonconformity is an empty goal, and rebellion against prevailing opinion merely because it is prevailing should no more be praised than acquiescence to it. Indeed, it is often a mask for cowardice, and few are more pathetic than those who flaunt outer differences to expiate their inner surrender.
If a minority culture doesn't accept you as much as majority culture, think about following a path of non-conformity
Nonconformists travel as a rule in bunches. You rarely find a nonconformist who goes it alone. And woe to him inside a nonconformist clique who does not conform with nonconformity.
The fragrances are really a dream about the possibilities of a life. Nonconformity, no judgement.

The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
You were born an original work of art. Stay original always. Originals cost more than imitations.
Once in a while it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told to.
They will say you are on the wrong road, if it is your own.
People would rather be wrong than be different.
We must not confuse dissent with disloyalty.
We are half ruined by conformity; but we should be wholly ruined without it.
Never do anything against conscience even if the state demands it.
A free society cherishes nonconformity. It knows from the non-conformist, from the eccentric, have come many of the great ideas.
Non-conformity is the only real passion worth being ruled by.
Any fool can do something cool and look cool, but it takes skill to make something uncool cool again.
Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
If you don't give yourself permission to create a new world, chances are nobody else will.

Read, every day, something no one else is reading. Think, every day, something no one else is thinking. Do, every day, something no one else would be silly enough to do. It is bad for the mind to continually be part of unanimity.
Every great historic change has been based on nonconformity, has been bought either with the blood or with the reputation of nonconformists.
For nonconformity the world will whip you with its displeasure.
Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
Most people believe most of the things they believe only because they believe that most people believe them.
We come from the mentality, that rarely sees the horror in symmetry or the beauty in non-conformity.
In this age, the mere example of nonconformity, the mere refusal to bend the knee to custom, is itself a service.
The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
Nonconformity is the highest evolutionary attainment of social animals.
Do not follow where the path may lead. Go, instead, where there is no path and leave a trail.
High-fiving people who share your beliefs is easy. What's hard is allowing others to have a different opinion without attempting to silence them.
If there is anything the nonconformist hates worse than a conformist, it's another nonconformist who doesn't conform to the prevailing standard of nonconformity.
